articles.title: Adani Green plans to redeem $750 million bonds due September - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The company, part of billionaire Gautam-Adani's ports-to-power conglomerate, said it will pay $169 million from its reserves and internal accruals, and $300 million from the consideration from a joint venture with TotalEnergies Renewables.
articles.content:
Adani Green Energy Ltd said on Monday it plans to redeem $750 million worth of notes due on Sept. 9, eight months before they mature.
